Article Title: 'MS Dhoni can't bat 10 overs running full stick'
Article Text:
File image of MS Dhoni (ANI Photo)

Poll Do you think MS Dhoni can still perform at a high level in cricket? No, not anymore Yes, definitely

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

GUWAHATI: Chennai Super Kings ( CSK ) are facing a tricky situation regarding MS Dhoni ’s batting position. Having drawn a lot of criticism for coming in to bat at No. 9 against Royal Challengers Bengaluru last week, Dhoni came in to bat at No.7 on Sunday against Rajasthan Royals.His team needed 54 off 25 balls at that point, but Dhoni couldn’t take this team over the line. When he departed after scoring 16 off 11 balls (1x4, 1x6) — Shimron Hetmyer taking a superb catch at deep mid-wicket — CSK still needed 19 off the last five legal deliveries from Sandeep Sharma. They failed to go the distance and lost by six runs.Asked to explain Dhoni’s flickering appearances with the bat and his changing batting positions, CSK head coach Stephen Fleming said, “It’s a time thing. It’s MS who judges it. His body, his knees aren’t what they used to be. He’s moving okay but there’s still an attrition aspect to it. He can’t bat 10 overs running full stick. So, he will gauge on the day what he can give us.“If the game is in the balance, he’ll go a little bit earlier and he backs other players when opportunities are up. So he’s balancing that. I said it last year, he is too valuable to us for leadership and wicketkeeping. To throw him in at 9, 10 overs... he’s actually never done that. So, from around 13, 14 overs he’s looking to go depending on the situation,” the former New Zealand captain said.Analysing their second straight loss this season after the opening win against Mumbai Indians, Fleming said, “It’s probably the two Powerplays. Our Powerplay with the ball went for best part of 80 runs and we were only able to manage mid-40s or early-40s. That’s the big difference."We were also sloppy in the field compared to Rajasthan, who were outstanding. The start of a new three-year cycle (following a mega IPL auction) is always a little bit difficult, especially if you’re just short of a little bit of form.”
Article Summary: Ms dhoni came in to bat at no.7 on sunday against rajasthan royals. Csk needed 54 off 25 balls at that point, but dhoni couldn’t take this team over the line. Head coach stephen fleming: “it’s a time thing. His body, his knees aren't what they used to be.”

Article Title: NBA Offseason Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers could sign 6-foot-10 Atlanta Hawks center to bolster team around Luka Doncic and LeBron James
Article Text:
LeBron James and Luka Doncic (Image via Getty)

Los Angeles Lakers

Clint Capela

(Disclaimer: The information and analysis presented in this article are based on current speculations. While the details are sourced from credible insights, it’s important to note that these are not confirmed moves or official statements. Readers are encouraged to take this analysis with a grain of salt and stay tuned for official updates as the offseason unfolds.)

Why the Los Angeles Lakers need a center like Clint Capela

Key concerns without Anthony Davis:

Clint Capela’s fit with the Los Angeles Lakers

Lakers Mailbag: LeBron & All-NBA, Playoff Seeding, Realistic Centers This Offseason? | Buha’s Block

Stat Average (2024-25) Points 8.9 Rebounds 8.5 Blocks 1.0

"Capela would be a strong fit, though, and is probably on the higher end of realistic free-agent targets for L.A.,"

(H/t: Sporting News)

How Capela complements LeBron James and Luka Doncic

Other free-agent options for the Lakers

Theare gearing up for a postseason push, but front-office decisions loom large in the upcoming free agency. One name that stands out as a potential target is Atlanta Hawks center, who could address the team’s glaring need for interior depth and defense.The Los Angeles Lakers have struggled with consistency at the center position this season. The Lakers’ blockbuster trade for Luka Doncic has propelled them to the No. 4 seed in the Western Conference. However, losing Davis has exposed their lack of interior presence, making them vulnerable against elite big men in the playoffs. Jaxson Hayes has shown promise when healthy, but his future with the team remains uncertain.- No reliable rim protector- Reduced rebounding efficiency- Lack of a pick-and-roll threatClint Capela, a seasoned NBA center, could be the solution.Clint Capela, currently with the Atlanta Hawks, is expected to enter free agency this summer. Despite a reduced role this season (21.4 minutes per game), he remains productive, averaging:His defensive rating of 108 per 100 possessions and career 1.4 blocks per game make him an ideal rim protector.wrote Bleacher Report’s Kristopher Knox Capela’s experience playing with elite playmakers like James Harden and Trae Young makes him a seamless fit alongside LeBron James and Luka Doncic. His strengths include:- Elite pick-and-roll finishing- Strong offensive rebounding- Ability to protect the rimWith the Los Angeles Lakers prioritizing floor spacing and playmaking, Capela’s athleticism and defensive presence would balance their roster.While Capela is a strong candidate, the Lakers may explore other centers in free agency, including:- Myles Turner (Indiana Pacers)- Mitchell Robinson (New York Knicks)- Nic Claxton (Brooklyn Nets)However, Capela’s affordability (projected $45 million deal) and playoff experience make him a realistic target.Also read: NBA Offseason Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers could land $231 million Memphis Grizzlies star guard to form Big 3 with LeBron James and Luka Doncic The Lakers’ championship aspirations hinge on surrounding LeBron and Luka with the right supporting cast. Capela’s defensive prowess and offensive efficiency could be the missing piece in their title pursuit. As free agency approaches, expect Rob Pelinka to seriously consider the former DPOY candidate.
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers have struggled with consistency at the center position this season. Clint capela, a seasoned nba center, could be the solution. Capela’s experience playing with elite playmakers like james harden and trae young makes him a seamless fit alongside lebron james and luka doncic.

Article Title: “Worst captain in sports”: Fans thrashed Brady Tkachuk for on-ice aggression against Blue Jackets
Article Text:
Image via Imagn Images

NHL fans rip into Brady Tkachuk after heated exchange with Blue Jackets

Brady Tkachuk , captain of the Ottawa Senators , is known for his aggressive and physical style of play. During a recent game against the Columbus Blue Jackets , his on-ice actions sparked backlash from fans, with some even calling him reckless and questioning his leadership. Some labeled him one of the worst captains, arguing that his aggression hurts the team.During the first period, Ottawa Senators captain Brady Tkachuk delivered a late shove to Columbus Blue Jackets forward Sean Monahan after he had already moved the puck. This aggressive move led Blue Jackets winger Kirill Marchenko to step in and confront Tkachuk in defense of his teammate. As a result, Tkachuk was assessed a roughing penalty.The incident sparked backlash on social media, with many NHL fans criticizing Brady Tkachuk’s actions. One tweeted saying, “Worst captain in sports.” Another one wrote, “Biggest fake tough guy in the league.” "The fact he is even in this game is kinda crazy after he elbowed the guys head into the ice last game," one wrote. "Crazy choice of caption from an organization full of TML fluffers. Guy gets grabbed by some no name basically wearing a bubble and ends up with the only penalty, brutal call," another wrote."How Brady got a penalty is hilarious, and honestly I’m not surprised by the comments.. sportnet followers are as trashy as their panel," a user commented. "So Brady gets jumped by a chickenshit with a full face shield and HE is the only player penalized? Make that make sense," another wrote.Tkachuk has always been a polarizing figure—while Senators fans appreciate his passion and leadership, others see his physicality as excessive. This isn't the first time he's drawn criticism for his rough play, as he often engages in fights and racks up penalty minutes.Despite the backlash, the Senators' management and coaching staff continue to support Tkachuk. General Manager Steve Staios and head coach D.J. Smith have praised his competitive nature, emphasizing that his emotional engagement is a key part of the team's identity. They believe his energy helps elevate the team, even if it occasionally leads to controversy.The Senators secured a 3-2 win over the Blue Jackets with goals from Ridly Greig, Drake Batherson, and Jake Sanderson. Boone Jenner and Kirill Marchenko scored for Columbus. Linus Ullmark made 29 saves for Ottawa, while Daniil Tarasov stopped 24 shots in the loss. Greig opened the scoring, but Jenner quickly equalized. Batherson and Sanderson extended Ottawa’s lead before Marchenko cut it to 3-2 in the third. Despite the late push, Columbus couldn't complete the comeback. Coach Travis Green praised the team's energy and effort, calling it a playoff-like game.Also Read: Miro Heiskanen injury update: Stars head coach reveals that he is making steady progress in recovery as the team prepare for playoffs While some fans criticize his leadership, others argue that his physicality and grit are exactly what the Senators need. Whether viewed as an enforcer or an overly aggressive captain, Tkachuk remains a central figure in Ottawa’s lineup.
Article Summary: Brady tkachuk, captain of the ottawa senators, is known for his aggressive and physical style of play. During a recent game against the columbus blue jackets, his on-ice actions sparked backlash from fans. Some labeled him one of the worst captains, arguing that his aggression hurts the team.

Article Title: Connor McDavid acknowledges Leon Draisaitl’s 50-goal mark with a simple yet impactful gesture
Article Text:
Image Via Getty

Leon Draisaitl: His Impact and Presence in the Locker Room

Edmonton Oilers surmount difficulty with star player absence

Leon Draisaitl continues to carve his niche as one of the best goal-scorers in the NHL. Draisaitl has managed to achieve 50 goals this season. He is a player crucial for the Edmonton Oilers as he finds the back of the net with awesome regularity. Again, this particular milestone shouted loud to teammates and fans, but Connor McDavid's voice was different. To show concern, this Oilers captain is out injured. Connor McDavid kept it simple on social media—reposting a celebratory post with just one emoji. The simplicity masks the enormous respect for what Draisaitl has accomplished.Scoring goals like Leon Draisaitl can never be matched. His performance this season is a testament to just how vital he is to the team. Coming back from injury, he wasted no time in micing his voice into the goal, scoring both his 50th and 51st in a huge win. Draisaitl has all the instincts, positioning, and execution to come through in the clutch.The Oilers’ social media pages were viewed as celebrating his achievement after their historic event, which quickly spread among fans and teammates. Connor McDavid's brief but meaningful reply said everything about the bond that exists between both star players. Along with Evander Kane, Connor Brown, Zach Hyman, and Darnell Nurse, other players were quick to acknowledge Draisaitl's achievement. Head coach Kris Knoblauch gave insight into what makes Draisaitl a deadly scorer, underlining the unique mechanics of his shot that make him very difficult for goaltenders to judge.The Oilers were, for perhaps the first time since they've ever played together, faced by a stretch of games without both Leon Draisaitl and Connor McDavid in the lineup. That has so happened - very much a rarity for these Edmonton Oilers, mainly because both have been the backbone of the team for years. Leon Draisaitl was injured during a game he played against the Utah Hockey Club. McDavid got a lower-body injury immediately after that while meeting the Winnipeg Jets.The Oilers have fought to remain competitive despite these setbacks. Coach Knoblauch gave an optimistic update, saying that McDavid would return before the end of the regular season. They then look up to the next fight against the Vegas Golden Knights while busy maintaining their momentum.Also Read : Connor McDavid Injury Update: Head Coach Provides Potential Return Date Amid Oilers’ Playoff Push With Draisaitl back on the ice and the sight of McDavid just around the corner, the Edmonton Oilers are looking for a convincing close to the regular season. Their ability to battle through adversity attests to the depth and resilience of their roster. As the team moves into high gear toward the playoffs, they will require their stars to propel them into victory.
Article Summary: Leon draisaitl scored his 50th and 51st goal of the season against the winnipeg jets. Connor mcdavid posted a celebratory message on social media. Mcdavid has been out injured with a lower-body injury. Coach kris knoblauch gave an optimistic update, saying that mcdavid would return before the end of the regular season.

Article Title: "It was a challenge to give grace": Dwayne Wade's wife Gabrielle Union shares heartfelt story about supporting him through his health struggles
Article Text:
Image via Johnny Nunez/Getty

Dwayne Wade’s wife, Gabrielle Union, talks about the feelings she went through as the NBA legend had to undergo surgery



Gabrielle Union Breaks Silence on Dwyane Wade’s Cancer Fight

Dwayne Wade has been married to his wife, famous Hollywood actress Gabrielle Union, for more than a decade, but it seems like the NBA legend faced difficulties in expressing his health battles even to his wife. Recently, Gabrielle Union appeared on an episode of Today with Jenna & Friends, where she spoke about the things she went through as her husband dealt with cancer.On the February episode of Today with Jenna & Friends, Dwayne Wade’s wife, Gabrielle Union, said, “That level of vulnerability, to go through removal of a good chunk of his kidney and the healing that involved, he needed us to be OK with his vulnerability.”She added, “But more than that, he needed to be OK with his vulnerability. It was a challenge to give grace and receive it.”The famous actress, Gabrielle Union, also spoke about the fears she had experienced when the NBA legend had to undergo surgery to remove a major part of his kidney.On the same episode of Today with Jenna & Friends, Gabrielle Union said, “Obviously, him getting that diagnosis was traumatic for him, …But you also don’t understand the journey and the toll it takes on your marriage, on your family, on your kids,”Gabrielle Union has also confessed that there were times when the actress thought the NBA legend was “gone” despite being positive.The NBA legend Dwayne Wade underwent his kidney surgery back in December 2023 but kept things private until he was fully cured and ready to talk about it in public.Dwayne Wade first opened up about his cancer diagnosis on his podcast in January 2025. He has revealed that he went for a body checkup when doctors caught something unusual on one of his kidneys.It was then on the recommendation of a third doctor, that he removed a majority portion of one of his kidneys. When this portion was then tested, it was revealed that had Dwayne Wade not gone ahead with the surgery, he would be dealing with Stage 1 cancer.The NBA legend has now recovered completely and is spending all his time creating more awareness about the illness. Fans are also pretty relieved since Dwayne Wade is completely healthy now.Also Read: "Nepotism at its worst": LeBron James' praise for son Bronny James sparks backlash as fans accuse him of "forcing nepotism"
Article Summary: Dwayne wade’s wife, gabrielle union, talks about the feelings she went through as the nba legend had to undergo surgery to remove a major part of his kidney. The famous actress also confessed that there were times when the actress thought thenba legend was “gone” despite being positive.

Article Title: "Our business is a piece of sh*t": Michael Wilbon criticizes ESPN and Stephen A. Smith’s obsession with Bronny James
Article Text:
Image via Tim Heitman and Allen Berezovsky/ Getty images

Michael Wilbon calls out ESPN’s priorities

ESPN under fire: Channing Frye, Charles Barkley, and Michael Wilbon criticize network’s shallow coverage of NBA

ESPN has come under fire for its relentless focus on Bronny James, and one of its own, veteran journalist Michael Wilbon , isn’t holding back. Wilbon, the longtime co-host of Pardon the Interruption, recently criticized the network for what he sees as an excessive push to make Bronny a daily topic. Speaking in an interview with Outkick, he revealed that ESPN executives attempted to get him and his co-host Tony Kornheiser to frequently discuss Bronny on their show—something they refused to do.During the interview, Michael Wilbon was candid about the pressure from higher-ups at ESPN to cover Bronny James extensively, even at the expense of more deserving basketball stories. He expressed frustration over the way the network prioritizes narratives that generate buzz over meaningful discussions about the game."There were shows that talked about Bronny every day," Wilbon said. "You know what shows I'm talking about. I don't care if my bosses get mad. They would try to get Tony and me to talk about it. No, we were not going to do it."He acknowledged that as a father, he understands why LeBron James is so invested in his son’s career. However, he took issue with ESPN seemingly placing Bronny’s name above legitimate stars in the NBA."They talked about him more than Shai Gilgeous-Alexander ," Wilbon added. "That's pandering. It's all pandering. Let me be clear: our business is a piece of sh*t a lot of days."Wilbon explained that Pardon the Interruption only covered Bronny when it was truly newsworthy—such as when he was drafted by the Lakers and when he played alongside his father on opening night. In contrast, he noted that other ESPN shows, particularly First Take, seemed to include Bronny in daily debates, overshadowing actual basketball discussions. Many fans have also voiced frustration, questioning whether ESPN's obsession with Bronny is truly about basketball or just a ratings ploy.Wilbon is not alone in his criticism. Former NBA player and analyst Channing Frye also recently called out ESPN after Stephen A. Smith falsely claimed that LeBron James did not attend Kobe Bryant ’s memorial. Frye took to social media to demand more accountability from the network."Please don't lie. Please don't make sh*t up. Fact-check yourself," Frye posted. "The beef is not fun when you've run out of things to talk about. Just don't lie to try and win an argument."Meanwhile, NBA Hall of Famer Charles Barkley has been vocal about what he sees as ESPN’s repetitive and shallow coverage. While speaking on Inside the NBA, Barkley mocked ESPN’s fixation on teams like the Lakers and the Warriors, arguing that it dilutes real basketball conversations."Them fools at the other network, which we're going to be working at next year, that's all they talk about," Barkley said. "Y'all just want to talk about the Warriors and the Lakers... Y'all are idiots cause y'all talk about the Lakers and the Warriors all the time."Wilbon’s remarks came at a time when First Take continued its back-and-forth with LeBron James, a feud that has dominated headlines. However, Wilbon emphasized that this issue is bigger than one individual or one show—it’s a reflection of the entire sports media landscape."This isn't about Stephen A. It's the entire industry," Wilbon stated. "That's what I want to remind LeBron. Our business is just sh*t some days. It just is."As voices like Wilbon, Barkley, and Frye call for a shift in the way sports are covered, the future of sports journalism remains uncertain. The industry is at a crossroads, where it must decide whether to prioritize thoughtful, in-depth coverage or continue chasing sensational stories for ratings.Also Read: LeBron James opens up about the real reason behind his feud with Stephen A. Smith: “He’s on a Taylor Swift tour run” With the debate intensifying, it remains unclear whether calls for journalistic integrity will reshape the landscape or if viral content will continue to dominate. Only time will tell if the media will embrace a more balanced approach to covering the game.
Article Summary: Michael wilbon, co-host of pardon the interruption, has criticized espn's coverage of bronny james. Wilbon revealed that espn executives tried to get him and his co- host tony kornheiser to frequently discuss bronny on their show. Charles barkley has also been vocal about what he sees as espn’s repetitive and shallow coverage.

Article Title: Will Roki Sasaki play tonight against Atlanta Braves? Latest update on Los Angeles Dodgers star's injury report (1 April, 2025)
Article Text:
Will Roki Sasaki play tonight against Atlanta Braves? Latest update on Los Angeles Dodgers star's injury report (1 April, 2025) (Image Source: Getty)

Roki Sasaki vs. Atlanta Braves matchup: Here are the latest updates on his availability for tonight

Lineup concern for the Atlanta Braves? Full injury report before the first pitch of tonight.

Tonight’s match is scheduled to begin at 10:10 p.m. ET at the Dodger stadium where the two rival teams are going to face each other on the ground. The game will be between the Los Angeles Dodgers and the Atlanta Braves, hosted by the home team in Los Angeles. It is going to be a challenging match for both the teams as both the teams are the major baseball teams and have strong MLB players.Interested viewers can watch the game live on their local television channels, such as SportsNet LA and FDSSO, and can also enjoy the live streaming on the Fubo online platform.The Los Angeles Dodgers is one of the dominating baseball teams and similarly, the Atlanta Braves is also dominating on the field. It is always a tough match to witness between these two teams on the field. The fans are waiting eagerly for tonight’s match as they will be witnessing their favourite player and the team against the opposition team.Roki Sasaki is one of the major pitchers for the Los Angeles Dodgers, and it is expected of him to participate in the game tonight as he also performed in the previous match held on 31st March 2025. The team is all set to open the match with the same lineup of the players from yesterday’s game, as it was a victory against the Atlanta Braves. The team players of the Los Angeles Dodgers are preparing themselves for the rivalry match tonight against the Atlanta Braves.The team has been praising Roki Sasaki for his powerful performance in the last few matches and is expecting him to be consistent in the 2025 MLB season. The team is also ready today to face their opposition team, the Atlanta Braves, at the Dodger stadium today at 10:10 p.m. ET.There will be some major changes in the lineup of the Atlanta Braves team today as some of their major players are placed on the injured list. One of the dominating players, Ronald Acuña Jr. will not be included in the lineup for tonight’s match as he has still not recovered from his injury. There was an unfortunate moment for the Atlanta Braves as Jurickson Profar has been suspended for the next 81 matches on March 31st, 2025, as he was caught violating the rules of the major baseball league. On the other hand, Reynaldo López has been assigned to a 15-day injured list and is not expected to be back before April end where whereas Nacho Alvarez Jr. is uncertain about his return after he was placed on a 10-day injured list after the previous match.Also Read: "Teach this kid"- Dodgers fans react to Roki Sasaki's struggles with command against Detroit Tigers
Article Summary: Roki sasaki is one of the major pitchers for the los angeles dodgers, and it is expected of him to participate in the game tonight. Ronald acuña jr. will not be included in the lineup for tonight’s match as he has still not recovered from his injury.

Article Title: A young QB like Shedeur Sanders or a veteran QB like Kirk Cousins? Who’s on the Cleveland Browns’ radar?
Article Text:
(Image via Getty: Shedeur Sanders)





Shedeur Sanders or Kirk Cousins? Who will be DeShaun Watson’s replacement in the Cleveland Browns?

Bleacher Report’s Gary Davenport

Mary Kay Cabot, Beat Writer for the Cleveland Browns

Dianna Russini, Senior NFL Insider for The Athletic

Wide receiver DeAndre Carter was welcomed by the Cleveland Browns

Also Read:

DeShaun Watson will be away from NFL grass for the longest time in the 2025 NFL season . Reason? A ruptured Achilles tendon (largest tendon in the human body) for the second time in 3 months.“We took a big swing-and-miss with DeShaun(Watson). We thought we had the quarterback. We didn’t. And we gave up a lot of draft picks to get him, so we’ve got to dig ourselves out of that hole. It would be great if we could get ‘the quarterback,’ but we’re not going to force it. We’re going to be patient, and we’re going to try to accumulate as many really good football players as we can.”, Jimmy Haslam shared in a private conference room at the mezzanine level at The Breakers mansion in Newport, Rhode Island, as per the New York Times.According to, “Like the (Tennessee)Titans, Cleveland(Browns) potentially adding a talented young quarterback on a rookie deal without dealing the second overall pick could be a game-changer for the (Cleveland)Browns.”According to, “ICYMI: Kevin Stefanski reveals the #Browns will take Shedeur Sanders to dinner Thurs or Friday when they attend Colorado’s #NFL showcase on Fri.”The official X account of the Cleveland Browns shared, “he sees the game really, really well” - Coach Stefanski has been impressed with Shedeur Sanders both on and off the field”.As per, “Based on the conversations I’ve been hearing, it would not be surprising to see Kirk Cousins end up in Cleveland.”Amidst their quarterback play, the official X account of the Cleveland Browns just hours ago released an X post with the caption:“Adding another weapon to the offensive arsenalWe have signed WR Deandre Carter » https://brow.nz/7f9324 31 YO DeAndre Carter was with the Chicago Bears before he joined the Cleveland Browns. In his 107 NFL games, DeAndre Carter accumulated 117 passes for 1331 yards, 6 TDs, and 23.5 yards on 133 kickoff returns.
Article Summary: Deshaun watson will be away from nfl grass for the longest time in the 2025 nfl season. The official x account of the cleveland browns shared, “he sees the game really, really well” - coach stefanski has been impressed with shedeur sanders both on and off the field.

Article Title: 'Rs 27 crore ka pahalwaan': Rishabh Pant's IPL 2025 struggles trigger meme fest
Article Text: Rishabh Pant is facing a challenging start with Lucknow Super Giants in IPL 2025, struggling to deliver with the bat despite being the most expensive player bought for Rs 27 crore. His low scores from the first three matches have prompted criticism and social media trolling. In three matches, he has managed just 15 runs at a dismal average of 7.50.
Article Summary: Rishabh pant is facing a challenging start with lucknow super giants in ipl 2025. His low scores from the first three matches have prompted criticism and social media trolling. In three matches, he has managed just 15 runs at a dismal average of 7.50.

Article Title: Sunil Gavaskar trolls Rishabh Pant with 'stupid, stupid, stupid' remark on live TV
Article Text:
Sunil Gavaskar and Rishabh Pant

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Bombay Sport Exchange Episode 1: Interview with Sanjog Gupta, CEO (Sports) at JioStar

NEW DELHI: Former India captain Sunil Gavaskar brought back the viral "Stupid, stupid, stupid" moment on live television on Tuesday, just before the IPL 2025 showdown between Lucknow Super Giants and Punjab Kings at the Ekana Cricket Stadium in Lucknow.His remark came in response to a question regarding Lucknow’s batting strategy in the ongoing season.Also See: IPL Live Score Lucknow Super Giants are currently missing key players, with Mohsin Khan ruled out of the tournament and speedster Mayank Yadav also unavailable. The team has been plagued by injuries.Ahead of LSG’s match against Punjab Kings, the presenter asked Gavaskar on live television whether the absence of key bowlers was the reason behind LSG’s aggressive batting approach.Gavaskar didn’t hold back and took a dig at Pant."I wish you had asked me this question a little while earlier because I spent a little time with Rishabh Pant , and I would have certainly asked him if that was the reason why you guys are playing like that. Maybe he would have responded, stupid, stupid, stupid question."Explaining further, he said, "I think when you look at Nicholas Pooran and Mitchell Marsh, they're naturally aggressive players. I think that's the way they play and that's so exciting to watch. And then there's Rishabh Pant also coming down the order. So they really have the batting, and they obviously know that. Look, if they don't have your sharp-edge bowlers, then you certainly need to put more runs on the board to give your other bowlers that much of a cushion in case they don't have a good day."LSG have played two matches so far, winning one and losing one.
Article Summary: Sunil gavaskar brought back the viral "stupid, stupid, stupid" moment on live television. His remark came in response to a question regarding lucknow’s batting strategy. Lucknow super giants are currently missing key players, with mohsin khan ruled out of the tournament and speedster mayank yadav also unavailable.

Article Title: IPL 2025: Punjab Kings captain Shreyas Iyer hands debut cap to 157.3 kmph star vs Lucknow Super Giants
Article Text:
Image credit: BCCI/IPL

Bombay Sport Exchange Episode 1: Interview with Sanjog Gupta, CEO (Sports) at JioStar

Head-to-Head Record:

Playing XIs:

Lucknow Super Giants:

Punjab Kings:

NEW DELHI: Punjab Kings captain Shreyas Iyer won the toss on Tuesday and opted to field against Rishabh Pant-led Lucknow Super Giants at the Bharat Ratna Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Cricket Stadium in Lucknow. Iyer included New Zealand speedster Lockie Ferguson in the playing XI, handing him his debut cap for Punjab Kings."We are going to bowl first. It's a new ground, new pitch, dew could be a factor as well, and with this being a red-soil pitch, we want to chase. The players have the freedom to express themselves. You have to play the situation; the important goal is to win. We try to keep things simple. We don't know how the pitch is going to play, but we have to adjust quickly. Lockie comes into the team," Iyer said.Also See: LSG vs PBKS Live Score Known for his express pace, Ferguson had clocked a blistering 157.3 kmph during an IPL 2022 match against Rajasthan Royals.Pant, meanwhile, retained the same XI for the match against Punjab Kings."We wanted to bowl first, but there are things that are not under our control, so happy to bat first. There are a lot of people who have come to support us, and we are definitely going to give our best. No changes for us," Pant said.LSG 3 - 1 PBKSWhen these teams met in Lucknow last season, which was also LSG’s first home game, the hosts secured a 21-run victory.Mitchell Marsh, Aiden Markram, Nicholas Pooran, Rishabh Pant (w/c), Ayush Badoni, David Miller, Abdul Samad, Digvesh Singh Rathi, Shardul Thakur, Avesh Khan, Ravi BishnoiPriyansh Arya, Prabhsimran Singh (w), Shreyas Iyer (c), Shashank Singh, Marcus Stoinis, Glenn Maxwell, Suryansh Shedge, Marco Jansen, Lockie Ferguson, Yuzvendra Chahal, Arshdeep Singh
Article Summary: Punjab kings captain shreyas iyer won the toss and opted to field against rishabh pant-led lucknow super giants at the bharat ratna shri atal bihari vajpayee ekana cricket stadium in lucknow. Iyer included new zealand speedster lockie ferguson in the playing xi.

Article Title: IPL 2025: Prabhsimran Singh's marauding knock, Arshdeep Singh's three-wicket burst help PBKS sink LSG
Article Text:
Image credit: BCCI/IPL

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Bombay Sport Exchange Episode 1: Interview with Sanjog Gupta, CEO (Sports) at JioStar

NEW DELHI: If left-arm pacer Arshdeep Singh set the stage with the ball, it was Prabhsimran Singh who stole the show with the bat as Punjab Kings dismantled Lucknow Super Giants with a dominant eight-wicket win in their IPL 2025 clash on Tuesday.Prabhsimran played a breathtaking knock of 69 off just 34 balls, smashing the LSG bowlers all over the park. His blistering innings, laced with nine fours and three sixes, ensured Punjab chased down the 172-run target with ease.On a pitch offering grip and variable bounce, Punjab Kings maintained their aggressive approach. Despite losing Priyansh Arya (8) early, Prabhsimran launched a fierce attack, propelling Punjab to a rapid start. His explosive hitting put LSG on the back foot, allowing captain Shreyas Iyer (52* off 30) and Nehal Wadhera (43* off 25) to cruise to victory in just 16.2 overs.Punjab Kings’ bowlers had earlier put up a collective effort to restrict LSG to 171/7 in 20 overs. Arshdeep Singh (3/43) led the charge, dismissing Mitchell Marsh for a golden duck in the first over and later accounting for Abdul Samad (27 off 12) and Ayush Badoni (41 off 33). Lockie Ferguson (1/26), Marco Jansen (1/28), Glenn Maxwell (1/22), and Yuzvendra Chahal (1/36) also chipped in with crucial breakthroughs.LSG’s innings lacked momentum, with Nicholas Pooran (44 off 30) being the only batter to provide resistance. Skipper Rishabh Pant’s struggles continued as he managed just 2 runs before falling to Maxwell. David Miller (19 off 18) and Samad tried to push the scoring rate, but Punjab’s disciplined bowling kept them in check.Digvesh Rathi (2/30) was the lone bright spot in LSG’s bowling attack, but he couldn’t stop Punjab’s aggressive chase. Iyer and Wadhera ensured there were no further setbacks, finishing off the chase comfortably.Punjab Kings will next face Rajasthan Royals at the Maharaja Yadavindra Singh International Cricket Stadium in Mullanpur, Chandigarh, on Saturday.
Article Summary: Punjab kings beat lucknow super giants by eight wickets in their ipl 2025 clash. Prabhsimran singh scored 69 off just 34 balls, hitting nine fours and three sixes. Shreyas iyer (52* off 30) and nehal wadhera (43* off 25) guided punjab to victory.

Article Title: Dennis Rodman puts death rumors to rest with social media update as fans blast the "joke" as insensitive
Article Text:
Image via Ronald Martinez/Getty Images

Dennis Rodman makes a post on social media to assure fans he is healthy after there were speculations of his death

Dennis Rodman, the NBA legend, found himself in a bizarre situation recently as fans speculated that he had passed away. This sent shockwaves across his fan base as many were confused if the rumour should be taken seriously. But turns out it was all false; the NBA legend took to his social media to clear up the confusion, and now fans are furious.Dennis Rodman recently made a post on Facebook where he is seen posing and giving a thumbs up, indicating that he is perfectly fine.The NBA legend is seen wearing a black shirt that he has paired with a black jacket. He completed his look with his former team, Chicago Bulls’ cap and a pair of sunglasses. The caption on the post reads as, “Yesss Sirr Alive and Well 👍🏾 What’s up #alive #imhere”.While fans are relieved to see Dennis Rodman healthy, they are also furious at the false rumour that was spread all day.A fan took to X and wrote, “That Dennis Rodman passing away joke was not funny. Death is not a joke even on April Fools Day.”Another fan commented, “I'm staying off fb i really thought dennis rodman went to glory smh mfs sick as hell”, while a third fan wrote, “Shorty why is yall playin wit Dennis Rodman like that😂😂😂🤦🏾‍♂️🤦🏾‍♂️🤦🏾‍♂️”A fourth fan noted, “Saying dennis rodman is dead as an April Fool’s joke is sick as f**k and I hope he sue yall”, while another user wrote, “That joke about Dennis Rodman being deceased is weird ! I don’t like yall”While Dennis Rodman retired decades ago, in 2000, he continues to be a popular name. The NBA legend took up a career in WWE after he started taking his hobby seriously and has even had a career in Hollywood.Dennis Rodman had his own MTV reality talk show back in 1996 and has even lent his voice for an episode in Simpsons back in 2005.While the fake news of Dennis Rodman passing away was shocking to many, it seems like his fans have finally calmed down.Also Read: "Celebrating a man landing on the ground?": LeBron James’ one-legged shot against Houston Rockets sparks mixed reactions from fans
Article Summary: Dennis rodman makes a post on social media to assure fans he is healthy. There were speculations that the nba legend had passed away. Fans are furious at the false rumour that was spread all day. The nba legend retired in 2000 but continues to be a popular name.

Article Title: IPL 2025: Digvesh Singh given strict punishment for send-off to Priyansh Arya in LSG vs PBKS
Article Text:
Lucknow Super Giants' Digvesh Rathi with teammates celebrates the wicket of Punjab Kings' Priyansh Arya during an Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 in Lucknow. (PTI)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Lucknow Super Giants spinner Digvesh Singh has been fined 25 percent of his match fees and received one demerit point for violating the IPL Code of Conduct during Tuesday's match against Punjab Super Kings in Lucknow.The violation occurred when Singh gave a send-off to Punjab Kings batter Priyansh Arya after dismissing him in the third over.The IPL issued a statement late Tuesday addressing the incident: "Digvesh Singh, Bowler, Lucknow Super Giants has been fined 25 per cent of his match fees and has also accumulated One Demerit Point for breaching the IPL Code of Conduct during his team's match against Punjab Kings at the Bharat Ratna Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Cricket Stadium, Lucknow on Tuesday.""Digvesh Singh admitted to the Level 1 offence under Article 2.5 and accepted the Match Referee's sanction. For Level 1 breaches of the Code of Conduct, the Match Referee's decision is final and binding," the statement further added.Punjab Kings emerged victorious in the match, successfully chasing down the target of 172 runs with 22 balls remaining and securing an eight-wicket win.Prabsimran Singh led the chase with an explosive 69 runs off 34 balls, including three boundaries and three sixes.Punjab Kings captain Shreyas Iyer contributed significantly with an unbeaten 52 runs from 30 balls, concluding the match with a six.Lucknow Super Giants, who batted first, posted a total of 171 for 7 wickets, which proved insufficient against Punjab's strong batting performance.
Article Summary: Digvesh singh fined 25 per cent of his match fees and received one demerit point. Singh gave a send-off to punjab kings batter priyansh arya after dismissing him in the third over. Singh admitted to the level 1 offence under article 2.5 and accepted the match referee's sanction.

Article Title: Stephen Curry scores stunning 52 points in Golden State Warriors’ win over Memphis Grizzlies
Article Text:
Stephen Curry. Image via: Frank Franklin II/ AP

Stephen Curry secures 50 points while creating a new NBA record during the Golden State Warriors vs Memphis Grizzlies showdown

The Golden State Warriors went on to fight the Western Conference battle against the Memphis Grizzlies on Tuesday night, and Stephen Curry made sure it was a game to remember at the FedExForum in Memphis. The playoff seeding was on the line, and the Warriors needed a victory to leapfrog the Grizzlies in the standings. Curry, with his ever-charming charisma on the court, delivered a stunning performance, adding a stunning 52 points on the board while etching his name in the NBA history .Stephen Curry was unstoppable during the Golden State Warriors' 134-125 victory over the Memphis Grizzlies at the FedExForum.Curry showed his all-around brilliance in a dominant performance, logging 36 minutes and 31 seconds on the floor. The Warriors' sharpshooter tallied 52 points on an efficient 31-of-51 shooting (60.0% from the field), including an impressive 12-of-20 from beyond the arc. He was perfect from the free-throw line, sinking all eight of his attempts. He grabbed 10 rebounds, dished out eight assists, alongside a strong defense with five steals and a block.The Warriors stormed out of the gate, outscoring the Grizzlies 45-32 in the first quarter. While Memphis fought back in the second, cutting the halftime deficit to eight, they had no answer for the two-time MVP. Curry put on a masterclass, dropping 32 points, seven rebounds, five assists, and two steals in just 20 minutes of action. He was lights out from beyond the arc, hitting 8-of-10 from deep.His incredible start placed him in rare company. According to the NBA: "With a 32-PT first half, Steph Curry has now tied LeBron James for the third-most 30+ PT halves (22) in the play-by-play era (1997-98)." He also set a new benchmark for the most halves with at least eight three-pointers in NBA history.By the time Curry exited late in the third quarter, he had compiled a staggering 45 points, seven rebounds, six assists, four steals, and a block while shooting 14-of-23 from the field. His dominance also propelled him past an NBA icon."Stephen Curry has passed Jerry West (25,192 career points) for 25th place on the NBA's all-time scoring list. He has 45 points (11-of-15 from 3-point range) to go with seven rebounds, seven assists, and five steals in the third quarter," Warriors PR shared on X.Also Read: NBA Record: Golden State Warriors' Stephen Curry becomes the oldest player to achieve this stat; rubs shoulders with Michael Jordan, defying age and gravity At 37 years old, Curry is still one of the elite players in the league.
Article Summary: Golden state warriors beat memphis grizzlies 134-125 at the fedexforum. Stephen curry scored 52 points on 31-of-51 shooting (60.0% from the field) curry also grabbed 10 rebounds, dished out eight assists, alongside a strong defense with five steals and a block.
